item.description: Massive show! Dahlback has never played Boston, so a great opportunity to catch him here and his music is very versatile too, so it should be a banger. Tickets here: http://www.wantickets.com/Events/118224/John-Dahlb-ck-The-Estate-2-08-13-21/ . Tickets will most likely sell out online as the date comes closer and then it's just a shit show at the door if you want to buy on the day of, so plan wisely.
item.name: John Dahlback
